thread.title: ‘RHONJ’ Star Teresa Giudice Faces More Heartbreak Without Jailbird Joe
thread.title_full: ‘RHONJ’ Star Teresa Giudice Faces More Heartbreak Without Jailbird Joe

author: Radar Staff
title: ‘RHONJ’ Star Teresa Giudice Faces More Heartbreak Without Jailbird Joe
text: Getty Images Getty Images Real Housewives of New Jersey star Teresa Giudice will have to say goodbye to her and Joe Giudice 's New Jersey home forever, RadarOnline.com has learned. Getty Images Getty Images Getty Images Getty Images When the Giudice's moved in during 2005, they had dished out $347,000 for the house, despite the original homeowners only paying $127,000. However, after Joe and Teresa's debt hell that landed them both in prison, the bank foreclosed the home and attempted to auction it off. Getty Images Getty Images Getty Images Getty Images Getty Images Getty Images The 44-year-old star was granted by the U.S. Bankruptcy court Judge in New Jersey that she'll be allowed to keep 55 percent of her profits from her legal malpractice suit, and the other 45 percent will go to creditors. Getty Images Getty Images The Turning The Tables author still owes over $219,000 to the IRS despite her small victory last month. Her husband is currently serving his 41-month sentence in prison — which began in March 2016 — for bankruptcy fraud. Getty Images Getty Images As Radar reported, Teresa was released from prison in Dec. 2015 after serving 15-months in prison for not paying $200,000 in taxes. We pay for juicy info! Do you have a story for RadarOnline.com? Email us at tips@radaronline.com, or call us at (866) ON-RADAR (667-2327) any time, day or night. X
